participant_1.background:
I often visit museums to expand my knowledge of the world and to enjoy the works of art.
I grew up with my parents and siblings.
i also give blood monthly in honor of my sister who died.
I am a single, child-free professional who enjoys flying model airplanes and eating gummy bears.
I'm afraid of not being able to accomplish my dreams.

participant_2.background:
My biggest fear is that something will happen to my kids.
My favorite music is the kind that gets my blood pumping and makes me want to dance.
i like to do all my shopping at walmart.
I'm glad that I have enough free time to read again now that my children are grown.
I am working on losing weight to improve my health.

content.text: Hey, thanks for chatting! What are your hobbies?
I like reading, shopping, and dancing. What about you?
I love to visit museums, fly model airplanes, and eat gummy bears!
That's cool! Have you ever flown your model airplane in a museum?
No, I haven't. I'm not sure if it's allowed.
I think it would be really cool to see a model airplane flying inside a museum!
Me too! I'll have to look into it.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially like music that gets my blood pumping and makes me want to dance.
Me too! I love to dance.
I'm doing some shopping and then I'm going to read a book. What about you?
I'm going to visit a museum and then I'm going to fly my model airplane.
That sounds like a fun day!
